tool_description: Audits competitor social media accounts to analyze their content strategies, posting patterns, engagement rates, and successful content themes.

competitor_handles.description: Social media handles or usernames of competitors to analyze

platform.description: Platform for competitor analysis (instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube)

content_types.description: Specific content types to focus on

include_engagement.description: Whether to include detailed engagement analysis

error_messages: Invalid competitor handles: At least one valid handle required, maximum 10 allowed.
Unsupported platform: Use one of [instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube].
Invalid analysis period: Use one of [30d, 60d, 90d, 180d].
Private or inaccessible accounts: Some competitor accounts cannot be analyzed.
Insufficient competitor data: Not enough public content available for analysis.
usage: Provide competitor_handles array, platform, and analysis_period. Optionally specify content_types and include_engagement. Returns comprehensive competitor content strategy analysis.

top_content_themes.description: Most frequently used content themes across competitors

posting_frequencies.description: Average daily posting frequency for each competitor

best_performing_formats.description: Content formats with highest engagement for competitors

common_hashtags.description: Most commonly used hashtags by competitors

engagement_benchmarks.description: Average engagement rates for each competitor
